Ok.output:
In the sky, the sun does shine,
A golden orb, so bright and divine.
Its warmth upon the earth does fall,
Awakening life, one and all.
Write a four-line poem about the sun.

The moon, a sentinel in the velvet sky,
Casts silver threads on the world below,
A silent guardian, ever watchful and wise,
In the quiet of night, it softly glows.
Write a four-line poem about the moon.

In the velvet sky, where dreams reside,
Stars twinkle like diamonds, side by side.
They whisper secrets to the night,
A cosmic dance, a timeless sight.
Write a four-line poem about the stars.
